definition: to be determined by/to depend on
variant of 視|视[shi4]/variant of 示[shi4]
(classical particle similar to 於|于[yu2]) in/at/from/because/than/(classical final particle similar to 嗎|吗[ma5], 吧[ba5], 呢[ne5], expressing question, doubt or astonishment)

sentences.english: The amount of government subsidy depends on the number of students they admit.
sentences.chinese: 政府资助额视乎收生人数而定。

sentences.english: Depending on the requirement of the top layer, backing papers vary very much in nature.
sentences.chinese: 视乎面层的要求，托底纸有各种极端不同的性质。

sentences.english: It all depends on perspective; on how you see the situation.
sentences.chinese: 这完全视乎你如何看待这种状况。

sentences.english: All hotel bonus offers are subject to availability.
sentences.chinese: 所有酒店优惠须视乎供应情况而定。

sentences.english: All hotel value-adds are not valid for Special prices and are subject to availability.
sentences.chinese: 所有酒店优惠不适用于优惠价及须视乎供应情况而订。

sentences.english: Advertising position will be offered on first-come-first served basis and subject to space availability.
sentences.chinese: 广告位置将以先到先得办理，并需视乎位置调配而定。

sentences.english: Depending on the requirement, either letter-press printing blocks or gravure printing places can be produced.
sentences.chinese: 视乎需要，它可以造成供凸版或凹版印刷用的印版。

sentences.english: August 4You’ll get as many chances as you want and need.
sentences.chinese: 机会的多寡视乎你的欲望和需求。

sentences.english: Most are reasonably priced between $25 and $40 depending on where you get it.
sentences.chinese: 最合理的票价由25元和40元，视乎何处得到它。

sentences.english: Filling the gap between model and reality may need something besides this.
sentences.chinese: 弥合模型和事实之间的差距光靠这些视乎不够。

sentences.english: Depending on how you look at this research result.
sentences.chinese: 视乎你如何看这个研究结果。

sentences.english: Availability of gifts depends on the level of demand.
sentences.chinese: 奖品之供应须视乎需求而定。

definition: to respond accordingly to/to adapt to/to cope with
Hong Kong Stock Exchange/abbr. for 香港交易所
to consider/to allow for/to use one's discretion/to measure (food and drink)
